nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels: Ghost Raid is a free online Star Wars Rebels browser game developed by Disney Interactive. The game was released on StarWars.com and Disney.com on July 16, 2014.

Many years into the reign of the evil Galactic Empire, a small band of rebels, led by Kanan Jarrus, did their part to strike against Imperial tyranny. Flying the starship Ghost, the ragtag crew performed a series of daring raiding missions on imperial supply ships, hoping to capture their cargo and deliver them to the growing resistance....

Around 5 BBY, a group of rebels pursued and raid a Galactic Empire convoy to Ryloth, Christophsis, Kashyyyk, and Toydaria. They then stopped for resupply on Lothal, and decided to stay and help the planet long-term.
